integration_patterns: Cloud data integration strategies using AWS and Snowflake

evidence.claim: Fuzion utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure to process health data securely.
The platform supports FHIR standards for interoperability in health tech applications.
Fuzion integrates with Snowflake for analytics and data warehousing.
They implement data streaming solutions using Apache Kafka for real-time analytics.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations is a foundational requirement in their health tech services.

icp.icp_reason: Fuzion supports X12 transactions and focuses on healthcare data integration.
